Description: Red pottery bowl with rounded base and shallow concave sides, rim chipped and partially reconstructed.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 226)
Rzeuska 2017 / Chronological Overview of Pottery from Asyut (132-133) (Catalogue number 73)
